price: 10 Nous avons déjà, avant toi, envoyé aux peuples du passé des Messagers
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ فِي شِيَعِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā min qablika fī shiyaʿi al-awalīna
